property.name: createPipelineRestartRunQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.restart_run ( parent_run_id, restarted_run_id, date) VALUES ( :PARENT_RUN_ID, :RESTARTED_RUN_ID, :DATE)

property.name: countPipelineRestartRunQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE restarted_runs AS ( SELECT parent_run_id as top_parent_run_id, restarted_run_id as top_restarted_run_id FROM pipeline.restart_run UNION ALL SELECT rr.top_parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id FROM restarted_runs AS rr JOIN pipeline.restart_run AS r on r.parent_run_id = rr.top_restarted_run_id ) SELECT count(*) as count FROM restarted_runs runs WHERE runs.top_restarted_run_id = ?

property.name: loadPipelineRestartedRunForParentRunQuery
property.value: SELECT r.parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id, r.date FROM pipeline.restart_run r WHERE r.parent_run_id = ?

property.name: loadAllRestartedRunsQuery
property.value: SELECT r.parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id, r.date FROM pipeline.restart_run r

property.name: loadRestartRunByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT r.parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id, r.date FROM pipeline.restart_run r WHERE r.restarted_run_id = ?

property.name: loadAllRestartedRunsForInitialRunQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE restarted_runs_down AS ( SELECT parent_run_id as top_parent_run_id, restarted_run_id as top_restarted_run_id, date FROM pipeline.restart_run runs UNION ALL SELECT r.parent_run_id, rr1.top_restarted_run_id, r.date FROM restarted_runs_down AS rr1 JOIN pipeline.restart_run AS r on (r.restarted_run_id = rr1.top_parent_run_id) ), restarted_runs_up AS ( SELECT parent_run_id as top_parent_run_id, restarted_run_id as top_restarted_run_id, date FROM pipeline.restart_run runs UNION ALL SELECT rr.top_parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id, r.date FROM restarted_runs_up AS rr JOIN pipeline.restart_run AS r on (r.parent_run_id = rr.top_restarted_run_id) ) SELECT DISTINCT r.parent_run_id, r.restarted_run_id, r.date FROM ( SELECT * FROM restarted_runs_up WHERE top_restarted_run_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM restarted_runs_down WHERE top_parent_run_id = ? ) rrrr JOIN pipeline.restart_run AS r ON (rrrr.top_parent_run_id = r.restarted_run_id OR rrrr.top_restarted_run_id = r.restarted_run_id) ORDER BY r.parent_run_id;
